source.43d93e17:
import datetime as dt
from datetime import datetime as dt
from datetime import date
from datetime import timedelta
start0 = dt.strptime('2020-10-25 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
end0   = dt.strptime('2021-01-01 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
print(end0-start0)
seconds0=(end0-start0).days*24*60*60+(end0-start0).seconds
print(seconds0)
source.2f58fc7f:
time=[]
for i in list(range(0,seconds0,60)):
    time+=[start0+timedelta(seconds=i)]
dates0=pd.to_datetime(time,format='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
print(dates0)
